name: Leo and Tig: Forest Adventures
description:
It’s time for a new adventure! The spirit of the taiga has led the brave friends to the heart of the forest, to the Big Tree of the Taiga, where the animals can make the home they’ve always dreamed of!

A great many adventures, riddles, and big discoveries are in store for brave Tig and his friends! Help these tireless friends complete challenging quests and get valuable rewards to decorate the new house and make it as marvelous as can be!

- Play as one of six wonderful characters.
- Each animal has their own unique abilities.
- Tons of gripping quests and spellbinding mysteries.
- Three remarkably beautiful locations to play in and explore.
- You will get extraordinary rewards for completing each quest.

Together, the friends can overcome any obstacle, so assemble the whole team and set off on your adventure!

In-game purchases in Leo and Tig: Forest Adventures expand the gameplay and unlock additional content. You can set restrictions in your phone’s settings to avoid accidental purchases.
In-game purchases are made with real money that is debited via the payment method linked to the user account.

The current version of the User Agreement can be found online at the following address: https://i-mult.tlum.ru/agreement
Personal Data Privacy Policy: https://i-mult.tlum.ru/privacy

If you have any questions or suggestions, write to us at support@i-moolt.com. We will definitely reply!
